abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Balmiki Prasad
            Singh at the meeting of December 21, 2000 concerning the
            Country Assistance Strategy, the Fiinancial Sector
            Adjustment Loan, and the Privatization Social Support
            Project for Turkey.
